modules.name: blog-frontend
modules.currentState: Vite + Vue 3 脚手架仍为 JavaScript 入口 main.js，App.vue 保留默认示例组件；尚未启用 TypeScript 与实际业务页面。
similarImplementations: admin-frontend/src (另一个 Vite+Vue 工程，可复用项目结构与配置)
blog-frontend/src/components (现有示例组件供样式/结构参考)
modules.testing: 尚未配置 Vitest/Playwright，当前无测试脚本。

modules.name: BirdBlog-backend
modules.currentState: Spring Boot skeleton with only BirdBlogApplication entry point, no controllers/services implemented yet.
similarImplementations: BirdBlog-backend/BirdBlog-admin (potential reference for architecture once populated)
BirdBlog-backend/sql (schema definitions for posts, categories, etc.)
modules.testing: No tests defined; Maven project currently empty aside from main class.

notedIssues: Frontend is JavaScript-based but requirement specifies TypeScript; migration needed.
Backend lacks REST endpoints; must design interfaces before front-back integration.
No existing API documentation—risk of mismatch between front-end expectations and backend implementation.
Accessibility and Liquid Glass design tokens not yet established anywhere.
missingInformation: Which backend modules should expose blog content?
Expected data models (post fields, categories, tags).
suggestedNextSteps: Review SQL schema to derive required API models.
Plan TypeScript conversion path for Vue project (enable lang=ts, add tsconfig).
Define API contract for posts listing/detail endpoints to guide integration.
